name: admin.users.setOwner
desc: Set an existing regular user or admin to be a workspace owner.

user_id.desc: Id of the user to promote to owner.

errors.cannot_modify_primary_owner: The primary owner cannot be modified.
errors.failed_to_set_user_to_owner: The change to the user's role failed.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.invalid_role_for_user: The user cannot be made into an owner.
errors.not_an_admin: This method can only be accessed by org owners and admins.
errors.not_supported: This is not a supported action.
errors.user_must_be_in_workspace: This user must be a member of at least one workspace.
errors.user_not_found: The requested user was not found.
